channel.title: Anyone know how to make this work
channel.description: okay i made a rune altar it has enter and everything but i dont know hwo to make it give out urnes to players i tryed something in client.java but it doesnt work i someone could tell em what to do it would really help im a pretty experiaccned coder though =\

item.title: Anyone know how to make this work
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

i tried that and i couldnt find the right one or somethin cuz it doesnt work i put it here

/RUNECRAFT/

public int RCTimer = 0;

public void CraftRunesRift(String runeName, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int rune, int runeAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(RCTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[20] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage(“You craft “+runeAmount+” “+runeName+” runes.”);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 20);
addItem(561,10 );
RCTimer = delay;
}[br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2007, 04:54:21 PM[/size][hr]can anyone fix this plz =[
